channel.title: DDO - Dungeons and Dragons Online
channel.description:
I never was into the classic D&D game, but from what I hear I do believe it was a local/solo/1player game, but this is I suppose a "remake" of the original D&D or it could be the actual original developers reviving the game. Also as made clear by the title, it is now being brought back in online play mode. You can have guilds/partys do quests and so on, so forth. Now even though I do not know much about the actual classic game like I afore mentioned, however, I want to say this: I generally hates games like this, but I am in love.
http://www.ddo.com/
EDIT: I don't know how old this game is etc but I do have the occasional crash even though im playing on a decent computer. my friend crashes as well so I know its just me. maybe their in a somewhat beta-stage meh idk.

item.title: DDO - Dungeons and Dragons Online
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’ve been playing this quite a lot, it’s a good game but it’s not much like the original D&D.
